DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety AIN457 versus placebo patient relapse multiple sclerosis .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety AIN457 ( Secukinumab ) Patients With Relapsing Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Multiple Sclerosis accord 2010 revise McDonald criterion Disease duration 10 year less At least one relapse last year EDSS score 0 5.0 entry Active chronic disease immune system multiple sclerosis History malignancy within past 5 year Active systemic bacterial , viral fungal infection Previous treatment one class multiple sclerosis therapy except previous treatment glatiramer acetate interferonbeta ( ) Any medically unstable condition Unable undergo MRI scan repeat blood test Pregnant nursing female Women childbearing potential must use reliable form contraception Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
